titleStmt.title: Several discourses tending to promote peace & holiness among Christians to which are added, three other distinct sermons / by Dr. Manton.
titleStmt.author: Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.

notesStmt.note: Identified in reel guide as Wing T14; Wing number cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
